alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Marshall (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 3:54PM CDT until June 25 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Marshall County in northeastern Alabama... Southwestern DeKalb County in northeastern Alabama... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 353 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Boaz, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Albertville, Boaz, Guntersville, Crossville, Geraldine, Douglas, McVille, High Point, Horton and Skirum. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
